question: How do I launch STAR-CCM+ version 18.04.008 or newer on VDI nodes for remote visualization?
answer: To launch STAR-CCM+ 18.04.008 or newer on VDI nodes, you must first load `CcEnv StdEnv/2023`, then `starccm-mixed/18.04.008` (or `starccm/18.04.008-R8`), and finally execute the command `starccm+ -rr server`.
